description: Returns information about a specified notification rule.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the notification rule.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the notification rule.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the notification rule.

nested_items.name: EventTypes
nested_items.description: A list of the event types associated with the notification rule.

nested_items.name: EventTypeId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID of the event. For a complete list of event types and IDs, see Notification concepts in the Developer Tools Console User Guide.

nested_items.name: ServiceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service for which the event applies.

nested_items.name: EventTypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the event.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the event.

nested_items.name: Resource
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource associated with the notification rule.

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: A list of the Chatbot topics and Chatbot clients associated with the notification rule.

nested_items.name: TargetAddress
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Chatbot topic or Chatbot client.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: The type of the target (for example, SNS).
Chatbot topics are specified as SNS.
Chatbot clients are specified as AWSChatbotSlack.

nested_items.name: TargetStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the target.

nested_items.name: DetailType
nested_items.description: The level of detail included in the notifications for this resource. BASIC will include only the contents of the event as it would appear in Amazon CloudWatch. FULL will include any supplemental information provided by AWS CodeStar Notifications and/or the service for the resource for which the notification is created.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The name or email alias of the person who created the notification rule.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the notification rule. Valid statuses are on (sending notifications) or off (not sending notifications).

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time the notification rule was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time the notification rule was most recently updated, in timestamp format.
(string) ---
(string) ---
